definition: to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
to loaf about/lazy/to hang around (and cause trouble to everyone)
don't know what to do with you/can't really say no to you
there is nothing to be done/one can't do anything about it

sentences.english: I'm sorry, I'm not in a position to help you financially.
sentences.chinese: 我很抱歉，我沒辦法在財務上幫你忙。

sentences.english: One relatively harmless alternative to sun tanning is to use self-tanning lotions.
sentences.chinese: 相對無害的替代辦法之一是利用太陽鞣自我鞣洗劑。

sentences.english: If a new strategy works, then it will be adopted and further routinized as a rule of thumb.
sentences.chinese: 如果新辦法行得通，以後就會沿用而成爲經驗法則。

sentences.english: I hope that these 17 tips will help you find a way out of grumpiness.
sentences.chinese: 我希望這17個辦法可以幫助你脫離暴躁的情緒。

sentences.english: He requires to do eVery abundancething his own way.
sentences.chinese: 他任何事件都要按本人的辦法做。

sentences.english: One is to argue geometrically that you have a right angle in here.
sentences.chinese: 第一種是幾何辦法，這是一個直角。

sentences.english: As for the lack of overtaking, the Ferrari man had no miracle solution.
sentences.chinese: 至於缺乏超車，這位法拉利車手沒有什麼好的辦法。

sentences.english: Recently, also identified specific procedures and the purchase of "three table" vetting .
sentences.chinese: 近日，又確定了具體的購買程序和“三表”審覈辦法。

sentences.english: This article aims to analyze various processing methods for groundwater excavation of the foundation ditch in earthwork construction.
sentences.chinese: 分析土方工程施工中基坑開挖地下水的各種處理辦法。

sentences.english: That's for mechanical harvesting-the grape growers'way of beating the unions.
sentences.chinese: 這是爲了便於機械收割，是葡萄園主對付工會的辦法。

sentences.english: If both sides make concessions, they can reach a settlement acceptable to both.
sentences.chinese: 雙方都讓點步，就能找到一個都可以接受的解決辦法。

sentences.english: But he still thinks that the loans are a good idea.
sentences.chinese: 但是，他仍然認爲進行貸款救助是一個好辦法。

sentences.english: I get the program "running" I have noway of assessing its quality.
sentences.chinese: 在程序真正運行之前，沒有辦法評估其質量。

sentences.english: Full Moon is approaching and she has to find a cure or never return.
sentences.chinese: 滿月將至，她要麼找到解決的辦法，要麼將一去不回。

sentences.english: Other ways to whittle down banks are thinkable.
sentences.chinese: 另外一些削減銀行的辦法是值得考慮的。

sentences.english: I see, but is there another method to figure out?
sentences.chinese: 我瞭解，但是否有別的辦法可想呢？

definition: to settle (a dispute)/to resolve/to solve/to dispose of/to dispatch
there is nothing to be done/one can't do anything about it
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
outcome/result/conclusion/in the end/as a result/to kill/to dispatch
